page.description: Zip a set. Options "d" - include Dictionary, "x" - include Indexes, "p" - display prompt dialog, "c" - pack tables first.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = Set.Zip(C setname [,C zipfilename [,C options]])

argument.name: setname
argument.description: The set to put into the zip file. If the set is in the current database, it is not necessary to specify the full drive and path.

argument.name: zipfilename
argument.description: Default = <Set_Name>.zip. The name of the zip file to create.

argument.name: options
argument.description: Options is a string that can include one or more of the following flags:

item.name: P
item.description: Display the "Zip Set" dialog box. If "P" not specified, the set is zipped without any user prompting.

page.discussion: The SET.ZIP() method zips the components of a set into one file.
